ARABIC: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُمْ فَمِنكُمْ كَافِرٌ وَمِنكُم مُّؤْمِنٌ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is He who created you. Yet among you are those who are kafir and those who have iman. Allah sees what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is He who created you, though one of you is an infidel and one of you a believer; yet God perceives what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He it is Who has created you: and among you are those that deny the Truth and among you are those that believe in it. Allah observes all that you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is He who has created you all but some of you have accepted the faith and some of you have not. God is Well Aware of what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is He Who has created you, so among you one is a disbeliever whereas another is a Muslim; and Allah is seeing your deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He it is Who created you, then some of you are disbelievers and some of you are believers. And Allah is All-Seer of what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He it is Who created you, but one of you is an unbeliever and another of you is a believer; and Allah sees what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It is He who created you. One of you is an unbeliever, and one of you a believer; and God sees the things you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He it is Who created you, but one of you is a disbeliever and one of you is a believer, and Allah is Seer of what ye do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It was He who created you; and some of you are those who deny this truth, and some who believe [in it]. God sees everything you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He it is Who hath created you; then of you some are Infidels and of you some are believers; and Allah is of that which ye Work Beholder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is He who created you. Then some of you are faithless and some of you are faithful, and Allah watches what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is He Who has created you; and of you are some that are Unbelievers, and some that are Believers: and Allah sees well all that ye do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He it is Who created you, then some of you are disbelievers and some of you are believers. And Allah is All-Seer of what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is He who created you. Amongst you is an unbeliever and amongst you is a believer. Allah sees the things you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is He who created you. Some of you are unbelievers, and some of you are believers. And God perceives what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It is He who created you, and among you is the disbeliever, and among you is the believer. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [64:2] It is He Who created you. Then some of you are disbelievers and some of you are believers, in [terms of] your original disposition; then He makes you die and brings you back to life in that same [disposition]; and God is Seer of what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He it is Who created you) from Adam and Adam is from dust, (but one of you is a disbeliever) openly (and one of you is a believer) openly; it is also said that this means: one of you is a disbeliever who becomes a believer-this is said as an encouragement to accept faith-and one of you is a believer who becomes a disbeliever-this is a warning against disbelief-; it is also said that this means: one of you is a disbeliever both inwardly and outwardly-this is the real disbeliever-and one of you is a believer inwardly and outwardly and this is the real believer, and one of you is a disbeliever inwardly and a believer outwardly, and this is the hypocrite, (and Allah is Seer of what ye do) of good and evil.
